mapper.insert: insert into t_oper_log(title, businessType, method, requestMethod, operName, deptName, operUrl, operIp, operLocation, operParam, jsonResult, state, errorMsg, operTime) values (#{title}, #{businessType}, #{method}, #{requestMethod}, #{operName}, #{deptName}, #{operUrl}, #{operIp}, #{operLocation}, #{operParam}, #{jsonResult}, #{state}, #{errorMsg}, getDate())
